item.title: 澳大利亚央行认为 "贸易战 "情景下失业率将升至 6% 附近
item.description: 澳大利亚央行警告说，在 "贸易战 "的情况下，美国将在2026年重新征收更高的 "解放日 "关税，所有国家都将采取报复行动，失业率将攀升至近6%。【原文：Australia’s central bank warned that the unemployment rate would climb to nearly 6% in a “trade war” scenario where the US re-imposes higher ‘Liberation Day’ tariffs in 2026 and all countries retaliate.】

item.title: 随着 Shein 和 Temu 的扩张，日本考虑对小包裹征税
item.description: 日本正在酝酿对包括中国在内的小包裹免税政策进行审查，与其他国家政府一道加强对Shein和PDD Holdings Inc's的Temu使用的免税渠道的审查。【原文：Japan is mulling a review of tax exemptions for small parcels including those shipped from China, joining a slew of governments stepping up scrutiny over a duty-free channel used by Shein and PDD Holdings Inc’s Temu.】

item.title: 沙特浆果是埃及私募股权基金的投资项目之一
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯种植浆果和尼罗河畔的一个农业项目，是埃及主权财富基金前负责人联合创办的一家新私募股权公司的首批投资项目。【原文：Growing berries in Saudi Arabia and a farming project by the Nile are among the first investments of a new private equity firm co-founded by the former chief of Egypt’s sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期债券拍卖获得 2012 年以来最弱需求
item.description: 日本 20 年期债券拍卖会的需求量为 2012 年以来最低，这表明市场担心在日本央行减持巨额债务的情况下谁会买入。【原文：Japan’s auction of 20-year bonds got the lowest demand since 2012, pointing to market concern about who will buy as the Bank of Japan dials back its huge debt holdings.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 买入近一年来最多的台积电存托凭证
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的基金购买了台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Cathie Wood’s funds made their biggest purchase of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. shares in nearly a year, underscoring a change in stance from being mostly sellers of the chipmaker since the third quarter of last year.】

item.title: 任天堂转向三星生产芯片，提高 Switch 2 产量
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co. Ltd.）已转向三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co. Ltd.）帮助制造 Switch 2 的主芯片，此举可能有助于这家日本公司提高游戏机的产量，以便在 2026 年 3 月之前实现高于预期的 2000 万台销量。【原文：Nintendo Co. has turned to Samsung Electronics Co. to help make the main chips for the Switch 2, a move that may help the Japanese company ramp up production of the gaming console enough to sell a higher-than-projected 20 million units by March 2026.】

item.title: 伯恩斯坦称美印贸易协定不太可能成为市场主要驱动力
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 日本加藤计划与贝森特会面讨论外汇等话题
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，他将在本周安排与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的双边会谈，讨论包括货币问题在内的议题，这引发了日元的进一步上涨。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said he’s arranging a bilateral meeting with US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent this week to discuss topics including currency matters, triggering further gains in the yen.】

item.title: 富国银行称强劲反弹后将买入美股并减持新兴市场股票
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Investors should reduce their holdings of emerging market equities and buy US stocks instead, according to Wells Fargo & Co.】

item.title: 特朗普批准 Perpetua 美国金锑矿的最终许可
item.description: 特朗普政府已为 Perpetua Resources 公司正在开发的一座金矿颁发了最后的联邦许可证，该金矿还拥有锑储量，锑是一种用于弹药的重要矿产。【原文：The Trump administration has granted the final federal permit for a gold mine being developed by Perpetua Resources Corp., which also has a reserve of antimony, a critical mineral used in munitions.】

item.title: 穆迪降级带来的避险需求减弱，黄金走低
item.description: 穆迪下调美国评级所带来的避风港需求提振逐渐消退，人们的注意力转回到两个最大经济体之间贸易紧张局势的缓解上，因此黄金走低。【原文：Gold edged lower as the haven-demand boost from Moody’s Ratings downgrade of the US faded, and attention turned back to the easing of trade tensions between the two largest economies.】

item.title: 中国银行再次下调存款利率以增强盈利能力
item.description: 中国几家主要银行纷纷下调存款利率，以降低融资成本，维持日益萎缩的盈利能力。【原文：Several major Chinese banks have cut their deposit rates in the latest efforts to reduce funding costs and preserve their shrinking profitability.】

item.title: 印度的脏炉子威胁全球钢铁零净排放目标
item.description: 据一家跟踪能源基础设施的非营利组织称，印度的钢铁行业可能决定全球去碳化目标的成败。【原文：India’s steel sector could make or break a key global decarbonization objective, according to a non-profit that tracks energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 报道称丰田将接受收购要约，丰田汽车股价上涨
item.description: 据报道，丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）董事长丰田章男（Akio Toyoda）将接受丰田汽车公司的收购要约，丰田汽车公司股价飙升9%，创4月28日以来最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of Toyota Industries Corp. surged as much as 9%, the most since April 28, after a report that the firm is set to accept a buyout offer from Akio Toyoda, chair of Toyota Motor Corp.】

item.title: 特朗普退出乌克兰-俄罗斯和谈，石油市场趋于平稳
item.description: 在连续两日上涨之后，石油价格变化不大，原因是交易商判断有迹象表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在放弃结束乌克兰与俄罗斯之间战争的努力。【原文：Oil was little changed after a two-day gain, as traders gauged signs that US President Donald Trump is pulling back from his efforts to end the war between Ukraine and Russia.】

item.title: 智囊团发现英国福利削减弊大于利
item.description: 根据决议基金会（Resolution Foundation）智库的分析，即使考虑到政府声称的改革计划将带来的就业增长，工党的福利削减仍将使数十万英国人陷入贫困。【原文：Labour’s benefit cuts will leave hundreds of thousands more Britons in poverty even after accounting for the employment boost the government claims the reform plans will deliver, according to analysis by the Resolution Foundation think tank.】

item.title: 越南顶级钢铁制造商称当地建筑业繁荣将推动经济增长
item.description: 越南最大的钢铁制造商和发集团（Hoa Phat Group）指望着越南不断增长的经济和从铁路到海港的大规模基础设施项目来推动公司的扩张，并缓解美国关税带来的任何影响。【原文：Vietnam’s top steelmaker Hoa Phat Group is counting on the nation’s rising economic growth and massive infrastructure projects from railways to seaports to fuel the company’s expansion and cushion any fallout from US tariffs.】

item.title: Bithumb 在首次公开募股前占据韩国加密货币市场的更大份额
item.description: 多年来，加密货币交易所 Bithumb 一直处于大型竞争对手 Upbit 的阴影之下，如今，它正在韩国严格控制的数字资产市场上夺回一个更有意义的份额。【原文：After years spent in the shadow of larger rival Upbit, crypto exchange Bithumb is clawing back a more meaningful share of South Korea’s tightly held digital-assets market.】

item.title: 交易员摆脱评级下调影响，亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者对穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调美国信贷评级一事不予关注，亚洲股市有望追随华尔街走高。【原文：Stocks in Asia were poised to track Wall Street higher as investors looked past the US credit downgrade by Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: CATL 将于 2025 年在香港上市，跃居世界第一
item.description: 当代安培瑞斯科技股份有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.尽管被五角大楼列入黑名单并经历了地缘政治风暴，这家中国电池巨头仍完成了今年全球最大规模的上市，融资 357 亿港元（46 亿美元）。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. will start trading in Hong Kong Tuesday after the Chinese battery giant wrapped up the world’s biggest listing this year, raising HK$35.7 billion ($4.6 billion) despite being blacklisted by the Pentagon and grinding through geopolitical storms.】

item.title: 随着谈判的进行，印度有望与美国达成多阶段贸易协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的新德里官员透露，印度正在讨论一项分三批达成的美国贸易协议，并希望在 7 月美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税生效之前达成一项临时协议。【原文：India is discussing a US trade deal structured in three tranches and expects to reach an interim agreement before July, when President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs are set to kick in, according to officials in New Delhi familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 万科债券反弹 144% 显示救援后信用压力缓解
item.description: 中国万科集团公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Financial strains are easing at China Vanke Co. after its largest state shareholder threw a lifeline to the company that proved too big to fail.】

item.title: 民主党人警告：特朗普的中东芯片交易危及美国国家安全
item.description: 参议院主要民主党人敦促特朗普政府重新审视与沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国达成的新人工智能协议，称扩大向中东国家销售人工智能芯片有可能将先进技术暴露给中国和俄罗斯，同时可能限制美国公司的供应。【原文：Key Senate Democrats urged the Trump administration to revisit new artificial intelligence deals with Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates, saying that expanded sales of AI chips to the Middle Eastern countries risk exposing advanced technology to China and Russia, while potentially limiting supplies available for American companies.】

item.title: 日本央行将在市场会议后酝酿削减债券购买规模的步伐
item.description: 在日本央行开始缩减巨额债券购买规模近一年后，收益率飙升，日本央行本周将向市场参与者征求意见，以了解他们对日本央行应如何积极推进量化紧缩政策的看法。【原文：The Bank of Japan will sound out market participants this week to gauge their views on how aggressively it should proceed with quantitative tightening as yields surge nearly a year after it began scaling back its huge bond purchases.】

item.title: 美国信用评级下调后，华盛顿特区史密森尼学会失去三A评级
item.description: 史密森学会是世界上最大的博物馆综合体，拥有 21 座博物馆和国家动物园，就在穆迪评级公司取消美国政府最后一个三 A 级评级几天后，史密森学会失去了穆迪评级公司的顶级信用等级。【原文：The Smithsonian Institution, the world’s largest museum complex boasting 21 museums and the National Zoo, has lost its top-tier credit rank from Moody’s Ratings just days after the firm stripped the US government of its last triple-A rating.】

item.title: 集团称特朗普起重机关税将使美国港口损失 67 亿美元
item.description: 据一个代表全美 81 个港口的组织称，对中国制造的起重机征收进口关税可能会使美国主要的货物装卸设施损失近 67 亿美元，并抑制基础设施投资。【原文：Import tariffs imposed on Chinese-built cranes could cost key US cargo handling facilities nearly $6.7 billion and inhibit infrastructure investment, according to a group that represents 81 ports across the country.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，洛杉矶港五月初货运量下降 30
item.description: 洛杉矶港是美国最繁忙的集装箱枢纽港，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税措施阻碍了贸易，5 月初该港的入境货运量下降了 30%。【原文：Inbound shipments to the Port of Los Angeles — the busiest container hub in the US — dropped as much as 30% in early May as President Donald Trump’s tariffs discourage trade.】

item.title: 司法部调查 Coinbase 客户数据盗窃案
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，美国司法部已开始对领先的加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：The US Justice Department has opened a probe into a recent breach at the leading cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global Inc., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿波罗利用近 10 亿美元私人债务收购 PowerGrid
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is turning to private credit to finance its acquisition of electric utility PowerGrid Services from Sterling Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 接近达成收购保险科技公司 Itel 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Thoma Bravo 正在进行收购 GTCR 支持的 Itel 的谈判，Itel 是一家专注于财产和意外事故理赔服务的保险技术公司。【原文：Buyout firm Thoma Bravo is in advanced talks to acquire to acquire GTCR-backed Itel, an insurance technology firm focused on property and casualty claims services, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
